description._content: Description: Hammock Road & Shore at Ekuassi with Sekondi in the distance. Looking N.E. Location: Gold Coast, Takoradi, Sekondi Date: 10 August 1920 Description: Foreshore at Sekondi native town looking Westward. Location: Gold Coast, Takoradi, Sekondi Date: 10 August 1920 Description: Foreshore at Sekondi east of Fort Orange, looking northward. Existing Breakwater in centre. Location: Gold Coast, Takoradi, Sekondi Date: 10 August 1920 Description: View looking S.W. from "K" Hill, Sekondi, showing existing Railway, Golf Course, Part of Native Town & Lagoon. Central Prison on right, and Takoradi Bay and Point in distance. Location: Gold Coast, Takoradi, Sekondi Date: 10 August 1920 Description: Existing Lighterage Harbour at Sekondi. Looking Southward towards Harbour. Location: Gold Coast, Takoradi, Sekondi Date: 10 August 1920 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/48 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives, uploaded as part of the Africa Through a Lens project. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons. Our records about many of these images are limited. If you have more information about the people, places or events shown in an image, please use the comments section below. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. Alternatively you could use the Suggestify tool to suggest the location of a picture. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
